bitmap.name: bitmap2
bitmap.label: Disabled bitmap
bitmap.description: Bitmap for disabled tool (default: derived from bitmap).

text.name: label
text.description: Label to display on the tool (default: no label).

value.name: wxITEM_RADIO
value.description: A checkable tool which makes part of a radio group of tools each of which is automatically unchecked whenever another button in the group is checked.

value.name: wxITEM_CHECK
value.description: A checkable tool (such tool stays pressed after it had been toggled)

value.name: wxITEM_DROPDOWN
value.description: Specifies that a drop-down menu button will appear next to the tool button (only GTK+ and MSW) (only available since wxWidgets 2.9.0).

text.name: tooltip
text.description: Tooltip to use for the tool (default: none).

text.name: longhelp
text.label: Long help
text.description: Help text shown in statusbar when the mouse is on the tool (default: none).

bool.name: checked
bool.description: Is the tool initially checked (default: 0)? (only available since wxWidgets 2.9.3)
